Description: Nine joining sherds of the lower part of a South Ionian pottery krater pedestal, possibly belonging to 1886,0401.830a. Thickened edge to foot. Outside glazed, fired red-brown, with two reserved bands; outside of foot and underside reserved.
Curator's comments: Whether this was part of the krater dedicated by Polemarchos or a separate pedestal cannot be judge from the remains, even if the piece was once reconstructed as one. See Schlotzhauer 2012, 121.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXII, no. 1) (inscription on 1886,0401.830.a)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 641, no. 1, pl. 30.1-2)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GE.966)
